title: (x) Need to recreate logo
content: I need to recreate the attached logo ... what you see is a scan with poor resolution. If you can identify the FGC font for me, it would be greatly appreciated. ![FGC to identify if possible](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053050im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48241.gif)
author: link

comments.content: Why do you need a typeface? That is just some simple geometrical shapes that are really easy to draw.
If you have to use type try Avant Guard. But I tend to agree with Jan
